name: Boomstick
description:
BoomStick is a 7-day project made by a team of 4. It revolves around the use of a completely ridiculous and over-the-top shotgun. Fight off a limited amount of enemies and avoid a lava pool.

  • WASD to move
  •  Space to jump
  • Click to shoot

CREDITS:

Ness Gagliardi: Artist 

Mae Scott: Level Design, Playtester, Lighting 

Sam Collins: Game Design, Lead Programmer, Artist 

Anthony: Artist

SPECIAL THANKS:

 MischievousSV: Music
